title: Support Orbital Temple - Kɔka Asɛmpatrɛw no ho
heading: Boa Orbital Asɔredan no akyi
vision: Wɔ November 28, 2025 , Orbital Temple bɛto afiri India wɔ ISRO rɔke mu. Adwinni satellite a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu a efi Wiase Nyinaa Kesee Fam, ɛyɛ nkaedum a ɛkyerɛ nnipa a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu denneennen, asɛnka agua a wɔde kyerɛkyerɛ, ne nea ɛkanyan wiase nyinaa nkɔmmɔbɔ a ɛfa kronkron daakye ho wɔ mfiridwuma, AI ne ahunmu nhwehwɛmu bere no mu.
videoCaption: Orbital Temple video nnianim asɛm, simma 1.

accomplished.heading: Nea Yɛayɛ
accomplished.content: Wɔ mfe anan nhwehwɛmu ne nkɔso akyi no, asɛmpatrɛw adwuma no ayɛ krado. Yɛawie hardware ne software nkɔsoɔ ama satellite no, yɛatwa aban shaker sɔhwɛ a ɛhia ma wimhyɛn adansedie, na yɛawie yɛn apam a yɛne ISRO yɛeɛ. Wɔayɛ satellite no. Mfiridwuma no yɛ adwuma. Wɔagye yɛn ho kwan sɛ yɛbɛtow ahyɛ yɛn ase.

needs.heading: Nea Yehia Mmoa Ma
needs.intro: Sɛ yɛbɛwie abakɔsɛm mu asɛmpatrɛ adwuma yi na yɛanya nkɛntɛnsoɔ kɛseɛ a, yɛhia mmoa ma nneɛma anum a ɛho hia:

launch.title: ISRO a Wɔde Fi Ase Ho Ka:

travel.title: Mfoniniyɛfo Akwantu a Wɔde Kɔ India:

decade.heading: Mfe Du a Ɛda Yɛn Anim
decade.intro: Saa asɛmpatrɛ adwuma yi nwie wɔ November 28, 2025. Ɛfiri aseɛ ara pɛ.
decade.paragraph1: Mfe 10 a edi hɔ no , saa satellite yi bɛtwa Asase ho ahyia, na abua din ahorow a efi okyinnsoromma yi ntwea biara so mena no. Nhomasua nhyehyɛe no botae ne sɛ ɛbɛtete mmabun mpempem pii wɔ satellite mfiridwuma mu, na abubu Ahunmu Kwan a ɛda Wiase Nyinaa Kesee Fam no. Nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw no bedu ɔpepem pii nkyɛn wɔ wiase nyinaa, na akanyan nkɔmmɔbɔ ahorow a ɛfa obi a obi yɛ, nkae, ne kronkron ho.
decade.paragraph2: Orbital Temple ne Sathi Roy ne The Roy Foundation reyɛ adwuma abom de ama saa mfe du anisoadehunu yi ayɛ nea ɛho hia wɔ amammerɛ mu. Roy Fapem no yɛ adwumakuw a ɛnyɛ nea wɔhwehwɛ mfaso a wɔatu wɔn ho ama sɛ wɔbɛtrɛw honhom mu nkyerɛkyerɛ, nkate mu ayaresa, ne nhumu nnwinnade a wobenya mu ama mpɔtam a wonnya mmoa yiye wɔ wiase nyinaa, na ɛde tete nyansa ne nnɛyi mfiridwuma abɔ mu de ayɛ wiase a ɛwɔ nhumu, nkitahodi, na ɛwɔ ayamhyehye kɛse. Yɛabom reyɛ nnwuma a ɛbɛma yɛahwɛ sɛ Orbital Temple bɛyɛ adwuma a ɛtra hɔ daa a ɛkɔ mpɔtam hɔfoɔ nkyɛn wɔ wiase nyinaa.
decade.paragraph3: Wo mmoa no nyɛ sika a wɔde boa ma wɔde fi ase kɛkɛ; ɛde kuw bi a ɛbɛka mfe du na akanyan ahunmu mfoniniyɛfo ne mfiridwumayɛfo awo ntoatoaso a edi hɔ no.

individualDonations.heading: Ankorankoro Ntoboa a Wɔde Ma
individualDonations.intro: Kɔka asɛmpatrɛw no ho wɔ level a ɛyɛ adwuma ma wo. Ankorankoro a wɔboa no ne abakɔsɛm mu adwuma yi fapem.

orbitalFriend.title: Orbital Adamfo
orbitalFriend.benefits: Wo nsa ka: Edin wɔ wɛbsaet honor roll · Personalized orbital certificate bere a satellite tow · Documentary aseda credit · Tow-deductible receipt
orbitalFriend.button: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Mu

satelliteSupporter.title: Satellite so Ɔboafo
satelliteSupporter.benefits: Wo nsa ka: Orbital Friend mfasoɔ nyinaa · Satellite tracking app a ɛyɛ soronko a wobɛtumi akɔ · Artist aseda video nkra · Toɔ a wɔtwa mu
satelliteSupporter.button: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Mu

spaceAdvocate.title: Ahunmu Ho Ɔfotufo
spaceAdvocate.benefits: Wo nsa ka: Satellite Supporter mfasoɔ nyinaa · Edin a wɔatintim wɔ documentary credits mu · To nsa frɛ wo sɛ kɔ kokoam documentary screening · Quarterly updates from the team · Tow-deductible Receipt
spaceAdvocate.button: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Mu

fundingOpportunities.heading: Sika a Wɔde Ma Ɔfã Pɔtee Bi
fundingOpportunities.intro: Wo ntoboa no tua asɛmpatrɛw adwuma no afã pɔtee bi ho ka tẽẽ. Paw nea ɛkasa kyerɛ wo, anaa fa pii bom na ama woanya nkɛntɛnso kɛse.

launch.title: Sika a wɔde bɛboa Ahunmu a Wɔde Tow Ahunmu
launch.description: Wɔbɔɔ ka ankasa wɔ ISRO rɔke no mu wɔ November 28, 2025 . Wei de Orbital Temple kɔ orbit, baabi a ɛbɛtena hɔ mfeɛ du sɛ adwini satellite a wɔde wɔn ho hyɛ mu ne asɔredan a ɛwɔ wim, a obiara a ɔwɔ wiase betumi akɔ mu.
launch.benefits: Wo nsa ka: "Launch Sponsor" asɛmti · Wɔada no adi wɔ nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔ nyinaa mu · On-screen documentary acknowledgment · VIP kwan a wɔfa so kɔ launch events · Kɔka video frɛ a wo ne Edson ne asɛmpatrɛw kuw no bɔ wɔ asram abiɛsa biara mu · Adansedi krataa a satellite orbital data wom · Tow-deductible Receipt
launch.button: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Mu

travel.title: Fa sika ma Mfoniniyɛfo no Akwantu a Wɔde Kɔ India
travel.description: Akwantuo, dabere, ne nneɛma a wɔyɛ ho ka ma adwumfoɔ Edson Pavoni ne core team sɛ wɔbɛdi adanseɛ sɛ wɔde sii hɔ wɔ India wɔ November 28, 2025 . Saa akwantuo yi ho hia ma nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔ sini, nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔfoɔ a wɔbɛka ho asɛm, ne Wiase Nyinaa Kesee Fam a wɔbɛgyina hɔ ama wɔ saa abakɔsɛm berɛ yi mu.
travel.benefits: Wo nsa ka: Ankorankoro aseda fi mfoniniyɛfo hɔ · Behind-the-scenes documentary access · Edin wɔ documentary credits mu · Tow-deductible receipt
travel.button: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Mu

carbon.title: Fa sika boa Carbon Offset Dwumadi no
carbon.description: Wɔbɛma carbon a wɔtow gu no nyinaa ayɛ nea ɛho nhia, a rɔke a wɔbɛtow ne satellite no a wɔbɛyɛ ka ho. Yɛde carbon offset nhyehyɛe ahorow a wɔagye atom reyɛ adwuma de ahwɛ ahu sɛ saa asɛmpatrɛw adwuma yi rennyaw nneɛma a atwa yɛn ho ahyia a enye biara.
carbon.benefits: Wo nsa ka: Edin wɔ wɛbsaet nidi nhoma mu · Adansedi krataa a wɔayɛ ama wo ankasa · Krataa a wɔtew tow so
carbon.button: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Mu

education.title: Fa sika boa Nhomasua Dwumadi no
education.description: Yɛ kasa ahorow pii adesua a edi mũ a ɛkyerɛkyerɛ Global South mmabun sɛnea wɔyɛ satellite ahorow na fi ase. Nea ɛka ho ne adesua nhyehyɛe a wɔyɛ, video a wɔyɛ, platform hosting, ne afe a edi kan a wɔde ma asuafo a wonnya mmoa yiye. Ɔbɔ nneɛma a ɛtra hɔ daa ma ahunmu nkyerɛkyerɛ.
education.benefits: Wo nsa ka: "Education Founding Sponsor" agyede · Akwankyerɛ a wɔde ma wɔ wo din mu · Wɔada no adi wɔ nhomasua nneɛma mu · Hu asuafo kuw a edi kan a wo sika a wode boa adesua no (virtual anaa in-person) · Documentary feature segment · Ɔkasa hokwan wɔ nhyiam ahorow a wɔde fi ase · Tow a wɔtew so gye
education.button: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Mu

docPreProd.title: Sika a wɔde bɛyɛ Documentary Pre-Production no ho ka
docPreProd.description: Fa sika ma "Dɛn na Ɛma Asɔredan?" kyerɛwtohɔ a wɔde kyerɛw nsɛm. Nea ɛka ho ne nsɛmbisa a emu dɔ 2 a wɔbɛyɛ wɔ India a wɔne adwene akannifoɔ ne honhom mu adwumayɛfoɔ, adwumayɛfoɔ nketewa akwantuo ne ne yɛ, ne mfonini a wɔadi ansa na wɔayɛ no a wɔbɛsesa. Saa ɔfa yi na ɛde kyerɛwtohɔ no fapem si hɔ na ɛma adebɔ akwankyerɛ no yɛ nokware.
docPreProd.benefits: Wo nsa ka: Associate Producer credit · Edin wɔ documentary credits mu · Kokoam screening a ɛfa pre-production footage ho · Behind-the-scenes access · Tow-deductible Receipt
docPreProd.button: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Mu

docProd.title: Sika a wɔde bɛyɛ Documentary Production no ho ka
docProd.description: "Dɛn na Ɛyɛ Asɔredan?" , asɛmti a wɔde hwehwɛ adwinni, mfiridwuma, ne akronkronne ntam nkitahodi mu. Nea ɛka ho ne sini a woyi wɔ aman pii so, nsɛm foforo a wobisabisaa adwene akannifo, nsɛm a wɔsesa no yiye, kɔla ahorow a wɔde hyɛ mu, nnyigyei nhyehyɛe, ne sini a wodi kan yɛ wɔ India ne NYC .
docProd.benefits: Wo nsa ka: Executive Producer credit · Featured in opening credits · Private screening for your guests · World premiere invitations (nkurow abien no nyinaa) · Private anwummere aduan a wo ne Edson ne documentary director di ansa na wɔakyerɛ nea edi kan · Behind-the-scenes access · Tax-deductible Receipt
docProd.button: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Mu

artCollector.title: Bɛyɛ Orbital Temple Art Collector Koro pɛ
artCollector.imageAlt: Orbital Asɔredan a wɔde si hɔ wɔ Mercosul Mfirihyia Biennial
artCollector.imageCaption: Orbital Asɔredan a ɛwɔ Mercosul Mfirihyia Abien Nhyiam a ɛto so 13, Porto Alegre. Clara Marques na ɔyɛɛ mfonini no.
artCollector.paragraph1: Wɔyɛɛ satellite abiɛsa a ɛyɛ pɛ maa asɛmpatrɛw adwuma yi. Baako bɛtow akɔ ahunmu wɔ November 28, 2025. Biako tu kwan kɔ tete nneɛma akorae nneɛma a wɔde kyerɛ wɔ wiase nyinaa. Wɔde biako asie ama obi a ɔboaboa nneɛma ano a ɔyɛ ɔyamyefo a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔde sika ma saa anisoadehu yi na ɔwɔ ahunmu adwinni abakɔsɛm bi.
artCollector.paragraph2: Eyi nyɛ nea wɔayɛ no sɛnea ɛte; ɛyɛ mfitiase satellite abiɛsa no mu biako. Ahunmu hyɛn a ɛyɛ adwuma koraa a ɛno nso yɛ ohoni . Satellite no kɛse yɛ 5cm3 na emu duru yɛ 245g , na wɔde sika kɔkɔɔ ayɛ dome .
artCollector.paragraph4: Sɛ́ nea ɔboaboa nneɛma ano no, wubenya installation koro no ara a wɔayɛ ama 13th Mercosul Biennial , tete nneɛma akorae ho ɔyɛkyerɛ a edi mũ a ɛkyerɛ satellite no sɛ adwinni ne mfiridwuma nyinaa. Wɔde saa nneɛma a wɔde asi hɔ yi akyerɛ wɔ amanaman ntam mmeae atitiriw na egyina hɔ ma ahunmu adwinni a wɔde kyerɛ a ɛkorɔn sen biara.
artCollector.paragraph5: Wo mmoa boa ma wonya sika de tua anisoadehu no nyinaa: nea wɔde befi ase, nhomasua nhyehyɛe, ne nsɛm a wɔakyerɛw a ɛbɛkanyan wiase nyinaa nkɔmmɔbɔ a ɛfa kronkron ho wɔ mfiridwuma, AI ne ahunmu nhwehwɛmu bere yi mu. Wo din bɛka abakɔsɛm mu asɛmpatrɛw adwuma yi ho daa.

gratitude.heading: Yɛde Aseda Ma Yɛn Akyigyinafo
gratitude.intro: Orbital Temple no yɛ nea ahyehyɛde ahorow, ankorankoro, ne gyidifo a wɔwɔ nkabom a emu yɛ den mu a wɔte ase sɛ adwinni na ɛbɔ ɔkyena mfonini ahorow no na ɛma ɛyɛ yiye.

pearmill.title: Ɔboafo a Ɔde sii hɔ
pearmill.description: Pearmill yɛ adwumayɛ ho aguadi adwumayɛbea ahorow a ɛrenya nkɔso ntɛmntɛm wɔ U.S. no mu biako, adwumfo, aguadifo, ne mfiridwumayɛfo kuw bi a wɔbom boa ma nnwuma a wɔafi ase a ɛyɛ nwonwa sen biara wɔ wiase no bi nyin. Wɔn mmoa a ɛfiri ayamye mu no maa Orbital Temple kuo no tumi tɔɔ nneɛma a ɛho hia na wɔyɛɛ open-source hardware a ɛma saa satellite mission yi tumi yɛ yie.

gratitude.yourName: Wo din betumi aba ha. Kɔka yɛn ho ma yɛbɔ abakɔsɛm.

people.heading: Nnipa a Wɔwɔ Saa Asɛmpatrɛw Yi Akyi
people.intro: Orbital Temple yɛ mfeɛ 10 bɔhyɛ. Ɛyɛ nnipa mmienu a wɔde wɔn nkwa nna abɔ adwini, mfiridwuma, ne nnipa nkitahodiɛ ho ban, na wɔrekyekyere nnwuma a ɛbɛma saa anisoadehunu yi akɔ so ama mfeɛ du a ɛreba no na ɛdi anim.

edson.name: Edson Pavoni na ɔkyerɛwee
edson.paragraph1: Edson yɛ mfoniniyɛfo ne mfiridwuma ho nimdefo a ɔhwehwɛ nnipa mu abusuabɔ a emu yɛ den mu wɔ adwinni ne mfiridwuma ntam. Ne dwumadi no fa adansi ho nneɛma a wɔde si hɔ, anwensɛm, mfoninitwa, ne satellite mfiridwuma ho.
edson.paragraph2: Wɔde n’adwuma no akyerɛ wɔ Mercosul Mfirihyia Biennial a ɛto so 13 (Brazil), IX International Biennale (Uzbekistan), ne NTU Global Digital Art Prize (Singapore).
edson.paragraph3: Ɔde bɛboro mfeɛ aduonu ayɛ adwuma wɔ adwini ne mfiridwuma mu , ɔne adebɔ akuo ayɛ adwuma ama 2016 Rio Olympics ne Inter American Development Bank . Proxxima Magazine bɔɔ ne din sɛ Brazilfoɔ adwumayɛfoɔ 50 a wɔyɛ nneɛma foforɔ paa no mu baako, na ɔnyaa IF Design Awards mprenu a ɛtoatoa soɔ (2017-2018) na na ɔyɛ Lumen Prize Futures Award awieɛ. Wɔde n’adwuma no akyerɛ wɔ afe abien afe abien mu na wɔde akyerɛ wɔ Ludwig Tete Nneɛma Akorae a Ɛhwɛ Nnɛyi Adwinni So (Budapest), Inhotim Asoɛe (Brazil), ne Design and Fashion Museum (Lisbon), na wɔde akyerɛ wɔ New York, Beijing, Singapore, Dubai, Rio de Janeiro, ne nkurow afoforo mu.

sathi.name: Sathi Roy na ɔkyerɛwee
sathi.role: Ɔde sii hɔ, The Roy Fapem & Ɔkwankyerɛfo Ɔhokafo
sathi.paragraph1: Sathi ne nea ɔhyehyɛɛ The Roy Foundation , adwumakuw bi a wɔnyɛ adwuma a mfaso wɔ so a wɔatu wɔn ho ama sɛ wɔbɛtrɛw honhom mu nhomasua, nkate mu ayaresa, ne nhumu nnwinnade a wobetumi anya mu ama mpɔtam a wonnya mmoa yiye wɔ wiase nyinaa. Fapem no ne sukuu ahorow, amammerɛ asoɛe ahorow, ne mpɔtam hɔ ahyehyɛde ahorow yɛ biako de kyekyɛ yiyedi nnwinnade a AI na ɛyɛ adwuma, mpɔtam hɔ adesua nhyehyɛe, ne nsɛm ho amanneɛbɔ a ɛkanyan nsakrae.
sathi.paragraph2: Esiane sɛ Sathi nim ntini ho nimdeɛ, ntetee, ne akannifo nti, wakyekye na wadi akuw anim wɔ Amerika Atifi fam ne India nyinaa, na wanya dɔla ɔpepem 600 wɔ afe afe adetɔn mu wɔ adwuma biako mu. Ɔsan nso yɛ nea ɔhyehyɛɛ OHM , honhom mu kuw a edi kan wɔ dijitaal so, Co-Founder of SUTE (a digyital AI-driven office platform), na ɔsom sɛ Ɔfotufo ne Wiase Nyinaa Nkɔso Titenani ma RISE Global Creative .
sathi.paragraph3: Sɛ́ Bengali-Amerikani bea a ɔde Apuei ne Atɔe Fam nyansapɛ ahorow bom no, Sathi de adwene soronko bi ba honhom ne adwinni mu akuw ahorow so wɔ afeha a ɛto so 21 yi mu. With a growing network of 65,000+ followers and over 40 million online impressions , ɔrekyekye wiase nyinaa mpɔtam a ɛka bom wɔ amammerɛ ne honhom mu mpaapaemu.

people.together: Yɛne The Roy Foundation abom reyɛ mfeɛ 10 asɛmpatrɛ adwuma a ɛka adwini, mfiridwuma, nwomasua, ne kronkron deɛ bom, ɛfiri aseɛ wɔ satellite a wɔde bɛto mu wɔ Ɔpɛpɔn 28, 2025, na yɛatoa so de kuw bi a ɛbɛduru mpɔtam a wɔnnya mmoa yie wɔ wiase nyinaa na ahyɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdi hɔ no nkuran.

join.heading: Kɔka Yɛn Ho
join.content: Wɔayɛ satellite no. Mfiridwuma no ayɛ krado. Wɔahyɛ da a wɔde befi ase: November 28, 2025 . Eyi ne bere a ɛsɛ sɛ wode wo ho hyɛ asɛmpatrɛw adwuma bi a ɛsan susuw nea adwinni betumi ayɛ, baabi a ebetumi akɔ, ne onii a ebetumi asom no ho.

fundSpecific.heading: Fa sika ma Ɔfã pɔtee bi anaasɛ Yɛ Ɔhokafo a Ɔhyehyɛɛ no
fundSpecific.description: Paw sikasɛm hokwan ahorow a ɛwɔ atifi hɔ no mu biako, bisa sɛnea wobɛyɛ adwinni a wɔboaboa ano no ho asɛm, anaa susuw amanne kwan so mmoa a ɛne w’anisoadehu hyia ho.
fundSpecific.button: Di Yɛn Nkitaho Na Mfi Ase →

generalDonation.heading: Fa Ntoboa a Wotumi Twa Tow Tow Bɛma
generalDonation.description: Ntoboa nyinaa, akɛse anaa nketewa, boa asɛmpatrɛw adwuma no na wobetumi atew tow so denam yɛn sikasɛm mu ɔboafo, The Field so.
generalDonation.button: Fa ntoboa denam The Field → so

taxInfo.heading: Tow a Wɔtew So a Wɔde Ma
taxInfo.paragraph1: Orbital Temple yɛ adwuma a The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , 501(c)(3) ahyehyɛdeɛ a ɛnyɛ nea wɔhwehwɛ mfasoɔ a ɛwɔ New York, de sika boa. Wobetumi atwe tow afi U.S. ntoboa nyinaa so akodu baabi a mmara ma ho kwan.
taxInfo.paragraph2:
Afuo no
75 Maiden Lane, Suite 906 na ɛwɔ hɔ
New York, NY 10038 na ɛwɔ hɔ
thefield.org
taxInfo.paragraph3: Sɛ wode check rema ntoboa a, yɛsrɛ sɛ fa memo: "Edson Pavoni: Orbital Temple" ma Performance Zone Inc..
